messages.message:
Thanks for connecting.
I am a former Strategy Consultant and have run an Executive Recruiting firm (ALCON Enterprises in Princeton, NJ) for many years. We have an interesting opportunity for a client in Commercial Innovation Strategy in NYC, and other locations. 

Your background looks like a fit, and I'd like to share this opportunity with you to see if you may be interested or could recommend others.

Let me know if you'd like to set up a call.

Rob
